track.name: Under Ground Kings
comments: i really love the flow of this.
Sometimes I need that romance / sometimes I need that pole dance [2]
"I was a cold dude, I'm getting back to my ways" - The way he sings that line is addictive.
JESUS CHRIST THE PRODUCTION IS SO GOOD
Sometimes I need that romance / sometimes I need that pole dance
People always ask how I got my nice things. Take my crown to the grave, I'm an underground king   ♥
This the Drake i think more people need to appreciated. that soft talking about women and pain drake is good but when he spit hard real nigga shit i love him even more.
The iTunes booklet says "Under Ground Kings".
the hook sounds a bit like She Will.
